replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2018-8-26 11:26 编辑 

以下命令一次性执行：
/scoreboard objectives add cd dummy

以下命令按顺序高频执行：
scoreboard players tag @a add offhold_stone {Inventory:[{Slot:-106b,id:"minecraft:stone"}]}
execute @a[tag=offhold_stone] ~ ~ ~ summon minecraft:creeper
replaceitem entity @a[tag=offhold_stone] slot.weapon.offhand minecraft:air
scoreboard players set @a[tag=offhold_stone] cd 1200
scoreboard players remove @a[score_cd_min=0] cd 1
give @a[score_cd_min=0,score_cd=0] minecraft:stone
scoreboard players tag @a remove offhold_stone

玩家把石头放到副手会召唤爬行者并消除这个石头，60 秒后会再给玩家一个石头。多人游戏可用。

replies.author: 26号猪肉
replies.txt_content: 就是制作一个技能：60秒cd 把石头切换到副手可以召唤一个苦力怕 多人也可以使用
